artist: Artist: Pierre Bonnard; Publisher: Ambroise Vollard
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Sargent Pillsbury, Sr.
medium: Color lithograph on Japan paper mounted on board
portfolio: From Quelques Aspects de la Vie de Paris (Some Scenes of Parisian Life), 1899
provenance: Ambroise Vollard, Paris, before 1914; Mrs. John S. Pillsbury Sr., Minneapolis, before 1914-1980; given to MIA.
title: Couverture de l'album Quelques Aspects de la Vie de Paris
